Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: "C" (2.0) or better in the following MAC 2311C, MAC 2312, MAC 2313, PHY 2048C    and EGN 3310

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Concepts of stress, strain, deflection; axial force, torsion, bending, combined stress, Mohr's circle, failure theories, design concepts, application to machines and vehicles.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: With a grade of "C" or better (2.0) or better in each of the following MAC 2311C, MAC 2312, MAC 2313, PHY 2048C, EGN 3310 and Consent of Honors.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Concepts of stress, strain, deflection, axial force, energy, torsion, bending, buckling, combined stress/strain, Mohr's circles, failure theories; design concepts, application to machines and vehicles. With Honors content.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering
